name: Khalid Al Dawsry
comment: You can't go wrong with Chicken Mandi, I had it twice. The chicken was cooked perfectly, juicy & soft (usually mandi chicken is a bit dry). I would defiantly recommend it.

name: Jane Smith
comment: The food was amazing! I had the Lamb Kabsa, and it was flavorful and tender. Highly recommended! The food was amazing! I had the Lamb Kabsa, and it was flavorful and tender. Highly recommended!

name: Ahmed Al Faisal
comment: I absolutely loved the Mandi rice. It was so aromatic, and the chicken was perfectly grilled. Iâ€™ll be coming back for more.I absolutely loved the Mandi rice. It was so aromatic, and the chicken was perfectly grilled.
